entities.name: mr diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is mentioned as a person who had a wand and was discussing the Code of Wand Use with Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as a person who was shown a wand by Mr. Diggory and was discussing the Code of Wand Use.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman Apparated next to Mr. Weasley and looked breathless and disorientated.

entities.name: the code of wand use
entities.description: The Code of Wand Use is mentioned as a document that has a clause broken by a non-human creature carrying or using a wand.

relationships.description: Mr. Diggory mentioned that the Code of Wand Use was broken by a non-human creature carrying or using a wand.
